reviews.review_text: We had the pleasure of dining at Ghoomar Restaurant in Porvorim, Goa, and it was an unforgettable experience! The traditional Rajasthani vegetarian food served here is simply outstanding. Each dish is bursting with authentic flavors and made with the finest ingredients, offering a true taste of Rajasthan. From the delicious dal baati churma to the mouthwatering gatte ki sabzi, every item on the menu is a treat for the senses. The service was impeccable, and the ambiance added to the warm, welcoming feel of the restaurant. It was a wonderful dining experience for our entire family, and we left completely satisfied. Highly recommend Ghoomar to anyone looking to indulge in some exceptional Rajasthani vegetarian cuisine!

If you’re in North Goa and craving an authentic Rajasthani dining experience, Ghoomar is a must-visit gem. This restaurant brings the rich flavors of Rajasthan to life, with every dish crafted to perfection. The dal and kadhi were truly exceptional, capturing that signature Rajasthani taste. The halwa was a highlight—perfectly sweet and full of traditional warmth. While all the items were delightful, the churma was the only one that didn’t quite match the high standards set by the rest of the meal.

The restaurant offers a great ambiance that makes you feel like you’re dining in the heart of Rajasthan. Plus, the prices are very reasonable for the quality and quantity of food provided. Convenient parking is available, which is a bonus in Goa.

For anyone looking to indulge in delicious, authentic Rajasthani cuisine, Ghoomar is a culinary experience not to be missed.

The food in general was amazing, prolly the beat veg thali iv had in 10 years. Being a very particular food critic, i dont think iv ever gone this crazy over a veg thali. The customer service is amazing and the the taste of the food is off the charts. And the funny part is its super affordable. Definitely recommend to come with family.
